results.summary: The agent report closely matches the human expert report with minor deviations, particularly the inclusion of PowerHal. Overall, it provides a comprehensive and accurate analysis.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM (CPU Manager) as a root cause and ruled out MMDVFS, but included PowerHal which was not mentioned in the gold standard.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the main causal chain but added PowerHal and did not specify SW_REQ2.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: All relevant metrics were correctly identified and matched the gold standard.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical and correctly ruled out MMDVFS, but the inclusion of PowerHal was unnecessary.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes were relevant and practical, aligning well with the historical fixes.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent, accurately identifying root causes and causal chains with minor omissions in metric details and actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM and PowerHal as root causes and ruled out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain was well captured, including CM, PowerHal, DDR, and VCORE, with SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 mentioned.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately reported VCORE and DDR percentages but missed some CPU frequency details.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical and correctly ruled out MMDVFS, with a clear explanation of the causal chain.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The report included relevant historical fixes, but could have been more specific in recommendations.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent, accurately identifying root causes and providing a logical causal chain. Some minor details and specific metrics could be improved for a perfect score.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the root causes related to CM, PowerHal, and MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly complete but lacks mention of SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately identified most metrics, but some specific percentages were not mentioned.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly identifies MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are relevant but could be more detailed.
